document_data.name: Mitrol Kran
document_data.mainbody: '''Mitrol Kran''' was a famed [[Sage]] of [[Alagh么n]], in the nation of [[Turmish]], [[Vilhon Reach]], in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Mitrol Kran's musings and scholarly works focused on the region of the Vilhon Reach. The Sage of Alagh么n concluded that "Shining [[Arrabar]]", the nickname given to the capital of [[Chondath]], was not just its physical description but also referred to the attitude of those who resided in the city. Mitrol Kran warned Arrabarrans that those looking to control neighboring nations in the 14{{th}} century Arrabar were destined to repeat the mistakes and failures of Chondath's tumultuous past.
